Title: Breath Attacks by Reflection Rip
Description:
Currently adds 2 new mutations: Fire Breath, and Ice Breath.

They are relocated versions of Flaming Hands, and Freezing Hands.  They do the same damage, but have an increased cooldown (25 turns) and a decreased cost (4).

This is my first Caves Of Qud mod. Leaning how to mod CoQ.
